modmenu.summaryTranslation.gamehelper: Change your gamerules in world, F3 features and get where you dead in a GUI.
gamehelper.screen.debugger_description: Show more information in vanilla game. Maybe helpful?
gamehelper.screen.debugger.key_descripti: Press hotkey below to toggle or active features.
This don't need permission, but some server might not support.
gamehelper.screen.debugger.key.F3C: Copy player location and level as a teleport command.
gamehelper.screen.gamerules_description: You may need to enable Command to do this!
gamehelper.screen.gamerules_tab.disabled: Disabled gamerule, which might be a experiment gamerule.
gamehelper.screen.info_display.1: You have spent %1$s in this special world!
gamehelper.screen.info_display.2: You have experienced %1$s deaths in this dangerous world!
gamehelper.screen.info_display.3: You have passed %1$s on bed in this sweet world!
gamehelper.screen.death_position.name: [%1$s] Death at (%2$s, %3$s, %4$s)
Teleport to this position.
Need permission.
gamehelper.message.death_position:
[GameHelper] Your death position is:
%1$s(x=%2$s, y=%3$s, z=%4$s).
gamehelper.screen.config.title: GameHelper Config
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.showGamer:
If false, gamerule name in GUI and translation in tooltip.
Else, gamerule name in tooltip and translation in GUI.
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.recordDea: Record death position in Chat and GUI.
Not available in Multi Player (server) now.
